config.UseTwentyFourHourClock.name: Use 24-hour clock (requires game restart)
config.UseTwentyFourHourClock.descriptio: Whether to use 24-hour time format for the in-game clock. Disable this to revert to the game's original 12-hour times.
config.GrandparentName.name: Grandparent name
config.GrandparentName.description: Which name to use to refer to your grandparent.
config.PierreShopName.name: Name of Pierre's shop
config.PierreShopName.description: The name to be used for Pierre's shop (called Pierre's General Store in the US English original). Any changes require a map change to take effect.
